children.name: Welcome to Healthy Active Meeting! These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your use of the Healthy Active Meeting application ("the App"), a meeting service designed to facilitate collaboration and communication. By accessing and using the App, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, please refrain from using our services.

To fully access the features of the App, you are required to register an account. During registration, you will provide certain information, including but not limited to your name, email address, and any other details necessary for account creation.

In the course of using the App, we may collect information related to your meetings. This may include participant names and meeting times during meetings. Your privacy and the security of your meeting data are important to us.
We use the information collected to provide, maintain, and enhance our services. This includes customizing your experience, addressing technical issues, and introducing new features.
We prioritize the security of your personal information. Your data will not be sold, traded, or transferred to third parties without your explicit consent, except as outlined in our Privacy Policy.
Users are expected to use the App responsibly and in compliance with applicable laws and regulations. Any abusive, threatening, or harmful behavior is strictly prohibited.
Your use of the App is also governed by our Privacy Policy. Please review the Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information.
Healthy Active Meeting reserves the right to terminate or suspend user accounts that violate these Terms or engage in inappropriate conduct.
Should you wish to delete your account, please send an email to
from the email address associated with your account. We will process your request promptly.
We may update these Terms from time to time. Any changes will be communicated by posting the revised Terms on this page.
If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms, please contact us at
